meanings.definition: At all times; on all occasions.
meanings.sent1: She always wears a red hat.
meanings.sent2: I always brush my teeth before bed.
meanings.sent3: The cat always chases its tail, thinking it will catch it one day.
meanings.sent4: His love for her was like the sun, always shining brightly.
meanings.sent5: The stars always twinkle in the night sky, never fading away.

meanings.sent2: The clock always ticks, marking the passage of time.
meanings.sent3: The little boy always hums a tune while he eats his breakfast.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter always fills the room, bringing joy to all who hear it.
meanings.sent5: The wind always whispers secrets as it dances through the trees.

meanings.sent1: They promised to always be there for each other.
meanings.sent2: The ancient ruins always stand as a reminder of the past.
meanings.sent3: The magic potion always turns the witch's hair bright purple.
meanings.sent4: His words of wisdom always echo in my mind, guiding me through life.
meanings.sent5: The bond between siblings always remains unbreakable, no matter the distance.
